backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and a comprehensive client management model including progress, follow‑ups, pauses, and subscriptions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping dark mode, color palette, typography, and theme‑coherence features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing UI, hooks, utilities, and page behaviors for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining vivid OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying them to core UI elements.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document bootstrapping the app, loading SheetJS for Excel export, and mounting the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth, backend readiness, theme provider setup, layout, and lazy‑loaded routing for main pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with bold visual styling, gradient hero section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating a user profile by entering a name and submitting via a mutation hook with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/ActionHi: Tooltip component displaying an inline hint message with an optional icon.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for activating a client by selecting a start date and follow-up day with validation and confirm handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientPr: UI card presenting primary client actions such as activate, pause/resume, renew, expire, and convert to full onboarding with disabled states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Dropdown filter button allowing selection of client status categories with counts and visual selection indicators.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Badge component that displays a client's status with different variants for each status type.
frontend/src/components/clients/ConvertT: Button for converting a client to full onboarding, supporting loading, disabled states, and explanatory hints.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting client data to Excel with options to export all fields or select specific ones and handle file generation.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Modal for marking follow-ups done or not, validating notes in manual mode and submitting results.
Displays a client's follow-up status, history, and provides an optional action to mark follow-up as done.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client plan with validation for pause duration and required reason.
frontend/src/components/clients/RenewSub: Dialog for renewing a subscription by selecting plan months, extra days, and start date with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/Subscrip: Shows a sortable list of subscriptions with status indicators and plan duration details.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Wrapper dialog displaying currently active clients using a generic metrics dialog component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Client: Reusable dialog showing a list of clients with export and navigation actions, supporting optional plan end date and onboarding state columns.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Expiri: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to display clients whose plans expire within 10 days.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Onboar: Dialog listing onboarding clients with export and conversion actions, plus navigation to client profiles.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Paused: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show clients who have paused their training, including plan end dates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Renewa: Dialog listing clients with plans expiring this month, with export and profile navigation options.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalC: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show all active clients without plan end date info.
frontend/src/components/debug/InitialLoa: Floating debug panel displaying initial load timing events with live updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, user menu, theming, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Centered loading spinner used as a fallback during route transitions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Provides onboarding status descriptions and an alert explaining activation requirements.
Multi-step onboarding wizard component rendering step indicators, content area, and navigation buttons with submit handling.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Displays weight and body measurement line charts using Recharts, with empty-state handling and formatted progress data.
Form for recording client progress measurements, validating inputs and submitting via a mutation hook with success/error toasts.
Renders a sortable progress history table showing measurements and weight trends with icons.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown menu items allowing users to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides an actorReady flag that becomes true shortly after the actor is available to avoid race conditions during invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Polls backend readiness with exponential backoff, resetting when actor changes and exposing readiness state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as app init info, user profiles, and client summaries, keyed by identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements a simple hash-based router with navigation and client code extraction helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStableActorConnect: Tracks stabilized backend readiness state to signal when the actor connection is fully usable.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Page for viewing and managing a single client's profile, activation state, progress, and follow-up actions with multiple dialogs and lazy-loaded charts.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Displays a filterable and searchable list of client summaries with export functionality and navigation to client profiles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page that loads client summary data, computes metrics, and shows dialogs for various client categories.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Client onboarding wizard handling validation, form steps, and client creation via backend mutation.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Utilities for formatting and matching client codes with zero-padding and normalized search queries.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines exportable client fields with accessors for use in spreadsheet exports, including status and subscription data.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly strings with special handling for common cases.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Uses SheetJS to export client data to an Excel file based on provided field definitions.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Helpers to determine follow-up due status, latest entries, and day-matching logic for clients.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Date formatting utilities converting bigint timestamps into readable or export-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/initialLoadTimings.ts: Debug-only timing utility to record and report initial load performance events.
frontend/src/utils/mobileNumber.ts: Mobile number normalization and validation helpers used during client onboarding.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Provides functions to compute total plan days, calculate a plan end date, and format dates for input fields.
Computes current month boundaries and filters/counts clients whose active subscriptions end within the month.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Determines client activation and status, computes display status, and aggregates counts of active, paused, and expired clients.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending typography, colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins for dark mode and enhanced UI styling.
project_state.json: Describes project state and features focused on dark mode, bold theme updates, and UI/typography improvements.
